message.content:
Monday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and avocado dressing.
Dinner: Baked salmon with lemon-herb sauce served over quinoa with sauteed broccoli and carrots.

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach and mushrooms.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, red onion, olives, cherry tomatoes, and a lemon vinaigrette.
Dinner: Stir-fried vegetable noodles with coconut aminos and sesame oil.

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding with mango and pineapple.
Lunch: Lentil soup with kale and sweet potatoes.
Dinner: Tofu stir fry with bell peppers, mushrooms, and rice noodles in a soy-free gluten-free tamari sauce.

Thursday:
Breakfast: Buckwheat pancakes with banana and maple syrup.
Lunch: Egg salad stuffed avocado with lettuce, tomato, and cucumber on the side.
Dinner: Roasted vegetable lasagna roll-ups with zucchini noodles.

Friday:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with banana, strawberries, spinach, and coconut milk topped with chia seeds and sliced almonds.
Lunch: Vegan Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, chickpeas, roasted tomatoes, and a homemade tahini dressing.
Dinner: Grilled portobello mushroom burgers with sauteed onions, sweet potatoes, and gluten-free buns.

Saturday:
Breakfast: Green smoothie with kale, pineapple, mango, and coconut water.
Lunch: Veggie wrap with hummus, avocado, cucumber, and bell peppers in a gluten-free tortilla.
Dinner: Roasted butternut squash risotto with fresh basil and nutritional yeast.

Sunday:
Breakfast: Almond butter banana toast with chia seeds and cinnamon.
Lunch: Vegetable spring rolls with peanut sauce and mixed greens.
Dinner: Cauliflower rice stir-fry with tofu, bok choy, and brown rice.

Remember to stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water, herbal tea, or coconut water. Enjoy your week!
